00001 #ifndef TEXTURE_H
00002 #define TEXTURE_H
00003 
00004 struct t_texture
00005 {
00006     GLuint glname;
00007     int width, height;
00008     int bpp;
00009     bool mipmapped;
00010     u8 *pixelcache;
00011     
00012     void bind()
00013     {
00014         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, glname);
00015     }
00016     
00017     void upload()
00018     {
00019         int format= (bpp==8? GL_LUMINANCE: bpp==24? GL_RGB: GL_RGBA);
00020         int internalformat= (bpp==32? 4: bpp==8? 1: 3);
00021         bind();
00022         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
00023         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);
00024         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_REPEAT);
00025         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00026         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, mipmapped? GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR: GL_LINEAR);
00027         glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00028         if(mipmapped) 
00029             gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, internalformat, width,height, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixelcache);
00030         else 
00031             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, internalformat, width,height, 0, 
00032                          format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixelcache);
00033     }
00034     
00035     void rebuild()
00036     {
00037         if(glIsTexture(glname)) glDeleteTextures(1, &glname);
00038         glGenTextures(1, &glname);
00039         upload();
00040     }
00041     
00042     void setpixels(int w, int h, int b, void *pixels)
00043     {
00044         width= w; height= h; bpp= b;
00045         if(pixelcache) delete[] pixelcache;
00046         pixelcache= new u8[width*height*(bpp>>3)];
00047         memcpy(pixelcache, pixels, width*height*(bpp>>3));
00048         upload();
00049     }
00050     
00051     t_texture(int w, int h, int b, void *pixels= 0, bool _mipmapped= false);
00052     
00053     ~t_texture();
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00057 #endif
